title: Learning Trajectory (LT)-Based Advanced Science Concept Structuring Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A customized science education program for professional adult learners, emphasizing gradual concept acquisition and practical case application. Smartphones are utilized solely as supplementary learning tools.

learning_goals: Learners can explain complex scientific phenomena by applying a three-stage learning trajectory model for science concepts
Learners can correct misconceptions at over 80% across learning stages through peer feedback and case studies
Learners can demonstrate a 30% improvement in scientific problem-solving skills compared to pre-assessment through learning trajectory evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
